snippet.title: Truants - OFFICIAL TRAILER
snippet.description:
Inspired by true events.

Weeks before classes are supposed to begin at Scrum University, professor adjunct Scott Bowers is having a lot of problems: one of his top students was expelled, and his teacher's assistant has gone missing. As if things couldn't get worse, he finds himself being mysteriously contacted online by a young girl, who claims she's been forcibly committed to a "torture boot camp" for "video game addiction." 

With several different applications at his disposal, Scott must browse through web pages and social media profiles, contact people of interest, and even download files from hacked computers. Can he save the kids trapped in the behavioral center, and discover why he's being targeted by the dark forces who run it?

TRUANTS: Coming soon.

Official Website - https://truantsthegame.com
Facebook - https://facebook.com/truantsgame
Twitter - https://twitter.com/truantsgame

Questions? Mention us @truantsgame or contact us at truantsgame@gmail.com
